name: Crabs Above Sow Below
description:
Crabs Above Sow Below is a Solo Dev creation by The Lonely Game Dev for the Epic Mega Jams 2022 

Team Name: The Lonely Game Dev

Developer Name: Tom Fiore

Game Name: Crabs Above Sow Below

Previously made content: 

  • Foliage assets provided by "Megascans"
  • Water material is from the UE4 water plugin
  • Music provided by "WeLoveIndies"
  • Tiki Torch Smoke  previously made by FluidNinja

Controls: -Left Thumbstick, AWSD - Moves Orange Crab 

                       -Right Thumbstick, Arrow Keys - Moves Blue Crab
